meanings.definition: To remove scum or foam from a liquid.
meanings.sent1: I despumate the soup before serving it.
meanings.sent2: She despumates the milk before making cheese.
meanings.sent3: The chef despumated the broth with skill and precision.
meanings.sent4: The dishwasher despumated the greasy dishes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Despumating the hot chocolate created a smooth and creamy texture.
